title: Strategies for Enhancing Mathematical Higher-Order Thinking Skills Using Online Discussion Boards

context.prior_knowledge: Graduate-level foundational mathematics knowledge and LMS (Learning Management System) experience
context.additional_context: Students engage in discussions without time/space constraints using personal mobile devices and develop critical thinking through in-depth discussions on mathematical problem-solving processes. Summative assessments will reflect discussion participation and video content quality.

learning_goals: Students can create and upload a 3-minute-or-less video explaining mathematical concepts to a discussion board.
Learners can generate two or more higher-order thinking questions (analyzing, evaluating, and reconstructing) about peers' videos.
Participants can submit reflective reports systematically reorganizing their mathematical thinking based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
